name: The Demon's Lust
description:
Strange things are happening in the mansion next to the abbey. Your nun sisters are slowly disappearing and no one who goes to the mansion to investigate comes back to tell, so everyone is too scared to do anything, including you. But, when your best friend becomes one of the victims, you decide to leave your fear behind and go to the mansion accompanied by your favorite cross, the one that has been with you since you were born.
⚫︎Explore a twisted mansion with puzzles and traps that will make it very difficult for you to survive in this survival horror.
⚫︎Get better weapons and face terrifying enemies who will have sex with you when they defeat you. Depending on the number of times you have had sex, you will unlock one ending or another.
⚫︎Defeat powerful bosses and rescue your friend from the demonic mansion where dark forces gather to satisfy her lustful desires.
